storyInfo: Reunion hires a trader to acquire a set of control systems. The two sides almost come to blows on finding the trader ambushing a Columbian convoy to obtain the goods, but the conflict is averted when two old friends meet again.

attributes.content: December 21st, 1097, 8:44 A.M.
Ancient Ruined Tower, Bleached Wasteland
Ruined buildings stand tall between the steep canyon walls, their purpose now unknown.
Those who live in the shadows of these ruins have brought life back to this barren land.
Here's your potato.
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: How's production coming along?
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: Never thought you could grow so many of them in a car.
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: I've never seen farming like this before...
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: What's it called? Hy... hy something...
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: Hydroponics. It's only become commonplace among nomadic cities in the last few decades or so. I'm not surprised that you didn't know about it.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: You seem to know a lot about these things.
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: A little bit. I've seen a lot of these farms on Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: But one car won't feed everyone.
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: No worries. It's only a matter of time, now that we have the help of the Kazimierz scholars.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: But all that knowhow is in the hands of that engineer and his team.
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: We're completely reliant on them.
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: And I still don't trust him.
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: Why not?
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: He's not even an Infected.
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: He says he's helping us because his wife and daughter died of Oripathy.
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: So it's because of his anger at the injustice of fate, and his sympathy for the Infected.
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: But what if he decides to start a new life, a new family?
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: Would it become inconvenient for him to keep supporting the Infected? Would he betray us for that new life?
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: He's not one of us, no matter what he says.
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: You're making assumptions based on hypotheticals. Just because someone isn't Infected doesn't mean they're our enemy.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: We'll never make allies if we treat every act of kindness with suspicion.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: Cooperation needs to start from trust. Even the word 'reunion' is all about coexistence, isn't it?
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: Did you already forget Talulah? That can't be allowed to happen again.
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: Then what we need is a contingency plan. Planning for a rainy day doesn't mean looking at everyone with suspicion though.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: Fine, fine.
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: Has anyone ever told you that you're becoming more and more like Patriot?
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: Aw jeez, that's a little much, don't you think...?
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: Changing the topic—how are the clothes?
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: A little tight, but wearable.
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: The material looks like it could stand up to some heavy use. Not bad.
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: It's cheap and practical—ideal for combat attire.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: Never thought I'd live to see the day.
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: How many years has it been since I last got something new to wear?
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: You can thank the Infected workers in Caladon for that.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: There's something that I don't quite understand, though.
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: Why are we taking down the Reunion symbol?
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: We don't need it anymore.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: We don't need Reunion?
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: That's not what I meant.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: We just don't need a symbol anymore.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: We're linked by a common purpose, not by lines and shapes.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: We should be helping and supporting the other Infected, not differentiating ourselves from them.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: So why is Team 4 still wearing the symbol then?
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: They have a special mission: running diversion.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: I... I don't understand.
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: They're operating in eastern Ursus, wearing the symbol in order to draw attention. That way, Ursus will think that there are only scattered remnants of Reunion roaming in the eastern wasteland.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Meanwhile, the rest of us can operate unnoticed by them, or any other country for that matter.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: They'll think that we're just rogues, operating independently. They won't connect us to Reunion, or give us a second thought.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Mr. Bean! You're here!
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: Bean reporting back.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: How did it go?
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: No problem. Captain Red has delivered the equipment to the warehouse.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Good. I was getting worried when you reported a change in the situation.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: We encountered something unexpected in Caladon, but nothing we couldn't deal with.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Good morning, Mr. Guard.
attributes.name: Elba

attributes.content: Oh, hello, Miss Elba.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: The rest of the Messengers are here.
attributes.name: Elba

attributes.content: What's the situation in Columbia?
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: It's a long story...
attributes.name: Messenger Member

attributes.content: Life isn't easy for the Infected on the frontiers, and the help that we can provide is limited.
attributes.name: Elba

attributes.content: But the Columbians are giving land to homesteaders, even the Infected.
attributes.name: Elba

attributes.content: I see...
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: The Infected in Tkaronto are willing to provide supplies and housing. For a price, that is.
attributes.name: Messenger Member

attributes.content: There's a brewery owner who's offering to help for free though. He's a trustworthy guy, just a little... eccentric.
attributes.name: Messenger Member

attributes.content: Sounds like a good start.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: Good work, Miss Elba.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: What about the guerillas? Any response from Avrora?
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: Captain Avrora has travelled to the Northern Plains to find the troops who stayed behind. She probably won't make it here.
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: However, Sarkaz warriors from the guerillas have already rendezvoused with Nine's team.
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Reinforcements from Kazimierz arrived yesterday.
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Then we're almost at full numbers.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: I'll check out the hangar. You guys go find Nine.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: Got it.
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: A massive machine sits at the center of the abandoned warehouse, and industrial noises fill the air.
Reunion mechanics busy themselves around it, the sounds of metal cutting and welding following them wherever they go.
Lightly! Lightly! Don't break it!
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: We've finally gotten the engine out of there.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: Oh hey, Mr. Guard!
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: How's the situation in Caladon? How are the Infected doing?
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: Could be worse, all things considered.
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: Setting aside Councilor Angst for a moment, we have half the city council in favor of maintaining the Infected community. Things won't get any worse as long as the community continues to operate.
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: Two months ago, a nobleman bribed a security guard to sabotage their power generator. Things could've been really bad if we didn't happen to have an engineering Caster stationed there.
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: Still, the Infected face a lot of difficulties. They need help.
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: I heard you encountered some trouble when transporting the engine?
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: I would call it a little unpleasant surprise.
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: As you predicted, there are a lot of people who don't look kindly upon the presence of the Infected community, but at least we took care of a bunch of problems.
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: Were our people at risk?
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: No one got exposed, although there are a few guys who should probably lay low for a while.
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: And we can't use the old supply tunnel anymore, after it got revealed by an explosion on the surface.
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: We'll need to scale down activities in Caladon for a few months.
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: It would seriously compromise the Infected community's day to day operations if anyone discovers our involvement.
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: Agreed.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: But the incident also allowed us to extract the engine without a hiccup, no traces.
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: So... are you really sure this thing can fly?
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: I've ridden on something like it before.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: Over in Columbia, they use a smaller version in cities... what do they call them? Rotorcraft?
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: I've seen recon rotorcrafts when I was in the Ursus army—about the size of a motorbike, maybe a little bigger.
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: But I've never seen a flying machine this big before.
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: Where did you get this thing?
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: Would you believe me if I said I found it in a trash dump?
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: I'm being serious.
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: Well, it's half-true.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: This is the only surviving prototype from a Columbian military project to develop a hovering vehicle. It was abandoned seven years ago due to lack of funding.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: After letting it rot in a warehouse for all those years, they finally decided to scrap it.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: Now, the Columbians usually outsource the scrapping of military equipment to third-party contractors. There are just too many projects to handle themselves.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: But as you can imagine, the contractor didn't exactly follow military SOP. All they did was take it apart and sell the parts to a 'scrap recycler'.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: And this 'scrap recycler' sold the 'scrap' to us.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: How did you even hear about the prototype?
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: That a-hole Dijkstra, of course.
attributes.name: Engineer Andrey

attributes.content: Dijkstra? That weird Columbian Caster? The one who calls himself a 'Cracker'?
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: That's pretty amazing.
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: So, what do you think, Andrey? Is the engine good to go?
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: It's got enough muscle, alright.
attributes.name: Engineer Andrey

attributes.content: But it's a little big... could throw off the machine's balance.
attributes.name: Engineer Andrey

attributes.content: Are you really sure about putting a Victorian engine on a Columbian flyer?
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: We'll find a way. Getting it in the air shouldn't be a problem, at least.
attributes.name: Engineer Andrey

attributes.content: Looking forward to it.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: It's not like you could fly this with a standard driving license, though. What about pilots?
attributes.name: Engineer Andrey

attributes.content: It needs two of them, and not many have the required skills, even in Columbia.
attributes.name: Engineer Andrey

attributes.content: Nine was concerned about that too, but Dijkstra said he had an idea.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: Either way, we've got more pressing issues right now.
attributes.name: Engineer Andrey

attributes.content: We need a whole new control system, and that's not something I can whip up for you. You'll have to find one.
attributes.name: Engineer Andrey

attributes.content: Not just any old thing will do, either. It needs to be something on the scale of a mining platform control system.
attributes.name: Engineer Andrey

attributes.content: We'll also need to replace the insulation plates for the Originium engine.
attributes.name: Engineer Andrey

attributes.content: I already told Nine about all this, but I don't know if there's been any progress on that front.
attributes.name: Engineer Andrey

attributes.content: No worries, a trader will be bringing them over in a few days.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: Are you talking about that bucket-head? He's got nerve, selling this stuff... How did he even get his hands on classified technology anyway?
attributes.name: Engineer Andrey

attributes.content: He's got his methods. Best not to ask too many questions.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Oh, Nine! Hey there.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: Well, you're the boss.
attributes.name: Engineer Andrey

attributes.content: Speaking of which, Guard, you may need to bring Captain Red over to meet with the trader.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: He wants someone from our side to be on site and 'have an understanding of the sourcing', in his own words.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: What a weirdo...
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: But alright.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: December 24th, 1097, 6:44 P.M.
So this is the rendezvous point.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: Are you sure we can trust this guy?
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: Hard to say... but Nine trusts him, at least.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: We've bought a lot of stuff from him, and in return he's asked us to do him a number of favors.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: He's eccentric, to say the least... you'll understand when you see him.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: I have a hard time trusting shady merchants like this...
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: A man wearing a strange helmet approaches from afar.
He is accompanied by several large men wearing shabby armor.
Yup... He might as well be carrying a sign that says 'Shady' in big red letters.
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: Good morning, good afternoon, and good evening, my friends.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Mr. Guard! How good to see you again, and looking so well too.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: I wasn't expecting you to bring company. But I'm not seeing any trucks or vehicles?
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: Where are the goods, Mr. Cannot?
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: No rush, my friend, no rush!
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: They're not in my hands right now, but they'll show themselves soon enough.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: I don't understand.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: Have patience, friend, patience. They'll be here.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: A few minutes later, a convoy of armed vehicles appears on the horizon, kicking up a cloud of dust over the barren ground.
Here they come.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Give me the binoculars.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: Take cover! Take cover! They're armed with Originium cannons!
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: That's... Volvort Kochinski's mark!
attributes.name: Elba

attributes.content: I want an explanation, Mr. Cannot!
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: What you seek is right in front of you, my friend. You see that big one in the middle?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: It's delivering a whole set of industrial-grade Originium engines and control systems from Columbia to Rim Billiton.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: You want us to raid an armed Columbian convoy?
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: That's your plan? You'd need heavy artillery to even put a dent in that armor!
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: No need to get excited, my friend. Did you think I was going to make a customer do it themselves?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Just sit back, and watch.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: About fifteen minutes later, the convoy passes through a canyon.
Ballista turrets and Originium cannons are on full alert, sweeping the surroundings for potential threats.
Driven by powerful engines, the heavily armored vehicles dash across the rugged landscape.
It is a loadout intended to take them safely across the Terran wasteland to their destination.
But there are very few guarantees in the wastes.
A boulder suddenly stands up from the ground, reaching eight meters in height, dirt falling off it like a waterfall.
It is a Metal Crab, camouflaged as a rock.
The creature charges at the convoy.
The cannons unload onto the beast, while the ballistae aim for its joints.
However, their efforts prove futile at slowing it down.
The Metal Crab smashes into the side of the large truck at full speed.
The armored vehicle topples over violently, crushing one of its escorts.
War cries and the sounds of clanging metal echo through the canyon.
Hundreds of strangely dressed warriors charge out from the shadows, from behind rocks or cracks in the canyon walls.
They throw explosives made from Originium crystals at the convoy, and fire at stragglers using improvised ballistae.
It is a scene of chaos, as the convoy's guards try to flee for their lives.
The outcome of the battle is never once in doubt.
It would be nice if our friends over there could be a little more careful... I'll need to check up on the equipment later, make sure there's no damage.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: See, I would have liked to deliver the goods earlier, but things didn't go quite as planned...
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: The convoy took a detour to avoid a Catastrophe, delaying their arrival.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: (Draws weapon)
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: (Draws weapon)
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: Dear me. It seems we have a misunderstanding here.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Mr. Cannot... you never told us you were a member of Rusthammer.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: Reunion hasn't fallen so far that we need to traffic with bandits.
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: My, my! What a hurtful accusation.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: And an untimely one, I should add.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: The Rusthammer warriors behind Cannot draw their weapons.
Watch your mouth, or I'll smash it in for you.
attributes.name: Rusthammer Warrior

attributes.content: I'd like to see you try.
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: Hold on, my friends! Calm down!
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: We're not here to fight today, are we?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: We're here for a reason. There's no need for us to go at each others' throats like wild animals.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Come now, Mr. Gareth, put away that weapon, will you? Didn't we agree that I would handle the negotiations?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Gareth...?
attributes.name: Elba

attributes.content: That voice... Elba!?
attributes.name: Gareth

attributes.content: It's you! You're alive!
attributes.name: Elba

attributes.content: I never thought I'd see you here!
attributes.name: Gareth

attributes.content: I didn't recognize you in that outfit.
attributes.name: Gareth

attributes.content: Gareth? Gareth 'Swiftblade'? You're alive?!
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: W-Why are you with Rusthammer?
attributes.name: Reunion Warrior

attributes.content: Oh, it's you guys!
attributes.name: Gareth

attributes.content: The warriors look at each other in bewilderment, still gripping their weapons, but seemingly unsure what to do with them.
Brothers, it's fine, I know them!
attributes.name: Gareth

attributes.content: Put down your weapons! They're okay!
attributes.name: Gareth

attributes.content: It's really you...
attributes.name: Elba

attributes.content: I thought you had...
attributes.name: Elba

attributes.content: It's a long story.
attributes.name: Gareth

attributes.content: See, we're all friends here, aren't we? Maybe even relatives, if we go back a few thousand years. How about we find somewhere else to chat?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Per my agreement with your other leader, I'll deliver this equipment to your... base?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Mr. Gareth, would you kindly bring a few other men with us to deliver the goods?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Will do.
attributes.name: Gareth

attributes.content: Are we seriously considering letting this guy into our base?
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: It wouldn't be his first time. We just have to trust Nine's judgment...
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: Beautiful! Simply beautiful!
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: You really fixed the thing!
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: I told you we could do it.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Reunion has surpassed the expectations of more than a few people. You certainly get things done.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: So, forty Originium Ingots, as agreed? My humble commission is included in the price, of course.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Thank you for your generosity, Mr. Cannot.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: What exactly are you planning, can-head? Just forty ingots for all this?
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: Why the mistrust, my friend?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Cooperation needs to start from trust. Conversely, considering our long history, it would do well for you to trust me a little more.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Think of it as an investment. I see bigger and better things in your future, and even more opportunities for us to work together.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Look at that hovercraft and tell me what you see.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: A hovercraft.
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: I see OPPORTUNITY!
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: With that, you will be able to traverse the wastes at no less than two hundred kilometers an hour, zooming from nomadic city to nomadic city. How many organizations on Terra can claim that kind of capability?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Now, what you do with it is none of my concern, but I would suggest treating it with care... It's not exactly an easy thing to repair.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Thank you for your assistance, Mr. Cannot.
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: Of course, my friend. Best of luck in your future endeavors.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Rusthammer is... different from how I imagined.
attributes.name: Elba

attributes.content: A lot of people misunderstand them, but they're not concerned with what outsiders... with what 'civilized' people think of them.
attributes.name: Gareth

attributes.content: ...Can I ask you a question?
attributes.name: Elba

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Gareth

attributes.content: Is Illa with you? What...
attributes.name: Elba

attributes.content: What happened to her?
attributes.name: Elba

attributes.content: Illa?
attributes.name: Gareth

attributes.content: Don't worry, she's fine.
attributes.name: Gareth

attributes.content: She's just... not feeling too well.
attributes.name: Gareth

attributes.content: Are her Oripathy symptoms worsening?
attributes.name: Elba

attributes.content: No, no, it's not Oripathy, don't worry.
attributes.name: Gareth

attributes.content: She... well, she's pregnant.
attributes.name: Gareth

attributes.content: P-Pregnant?
attributes.name: Elba

attributes.content: Can you imagine it? I'm going to be a dad!
attributes.name: Gareth

attributes.content: Oh... wow, so you guys have...
attributes.name: Elba

attributes.content: Don't worry, our Rusthammer brothers and sisters are taking good care of her. Those who are born onto the wasteland are blessed by the storms and the great earth.
attributes.name: Gareth

attributes.content: That's not what I was worried about.
attributes.name: Elba

attributes.content: I just didn't think that you would... hehe.
attributes.name: Elba

attributes.content: Anyway, congratulations.
attributes.name: Elba

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Gareth

attributes.content: I spent a lot of time thinking it over...
attributes.name: Gareth

attributes.content: Whether it would be irresponsible to bring a new life into this world, only for them to grow up in pain and suffering.
attributes.name: Gareth

attributes.content: But at last, Illa told me that she wanted to be a mother.
attributes.name: Gareth

attributes.content: And so I decided that I would do everything I could to protect and educate my child, whatever awaits them in the future.
attributes.name: Gareth

attributes.content: They will grow up to be a better person than I am.
attributes.name: Gareth

attributes.content: I... I really admire you.
attributes.name: Elba

attributes.content: Time to go, Mr. Gareth. Our work here is done.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Got it.
attributes.name: Gareth

attributes.content: Goodbye, Elba. I thought I'd never see you again. It's been a blessed day.
attributes.name: Gareth

attributes.content: Live long, Elba!
attributes.name: Gareth

attributes.content: You too.
attributes.name: Elba

attributes.content: Did you want to spend more time with your old friend? You can have it, you know.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: It's fine. We've said what we needed to.
attributes.name: Gareth

attributes.content: Very well then, let's go.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Well, look who's waiting for us. Did you have any unfinished business?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Impressive, by the way, to completely elude my notice.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Do not underestimate Catastrophe Messengers.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Do you remember me, Mr. Cannot?
attributes.name: Elba

attributes.content: Of course, Miss Elba.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: I remember everyone I've ever met. That said, you've changed so much over the past year that I could barely recognize you.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: It is always good to see old friends doing so well.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: You call everybody a 'friend'.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Do you really understand how much weight that word carries?
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: If we're truly 'friends'...
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Then I must ask you to answer a question before you leave. And answer truthfully.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: As you said yourself, cooperation needs to start from trust.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: So I need an answer that will develop that trust.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Certainly. Go ahead.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Why are you helping us?
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Don't try to dodge the question, or get around it with sophistry.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: I want to hear the truth.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Hahaha...
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: The man wearing a bucket on his head laughs wryly.
For a moment, he gazes quietly at the Reunion member before him, his eyes cloudy under the heavy helmet.
It was never my intention to play with words.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: But not everyone is able to accept the stark, unvarnished truth.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Some truths are better left unspoken, my dear Miss Nine.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Reunion does not need lies and deception.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: You have roamed the wastelands, the myriad realms of Terra. What have you seen?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Let me tell you what I've seen.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: On the frontiers of Columbia, I saw the both Infected and the poor caught between barren soil and dangerous beasts.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Their human dignity is built upon flesh and blood, but beneath the bodies lies the gold that made the monster that is Columbia.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: The people of Victoria cling to history and tradition like their lives depend on it. Their wealth and power serve only those who already have them—the greedy and self-serving noble class.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: To them, the Infected might be tools in their political plots, or weapons against their enemies, but never human beings.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: The 'most powerful country in Terra', and you could barely call it a civilization.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Two years ago, the Columbians turned a deaf ear to a Sami Snowpriest who prophesied that the End of Days is near.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: The Columbians said the Snowpriest was mad, but what do they know?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: They know nothing of Sami's long struggle against the frenzied darkness.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Sooner or later, this land... nay, the entire world must face the truth of that madness.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: The dark shadow beneath the northern tundra, the great gloom deep in the ocean, not to mention ancient calamity buried under the earth.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Despite all this, the people of the land live on secluded islands, waging wars against each other with sticks and stones.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Time is running out. The world is falling apart, and change must come sooner rather than later!
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Is that why you're helping us?
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: One of the reasons.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: I support any group that is trying to change things, be it Rusthammer or Reunion, or even those who merely sense the ship beginning to sink and are trying to save themselves.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Someone needs to do something.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: I've provided assistance to many individuals and organizations, from Rusthammer to Reunion, to the Cyclopes of Sami, to the mystics of Sargon...
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Unfortunately, no one has been able to come up with a solution.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: But at the very least, I can point the way.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: For better or for worse, we have to try.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Even if all you say is true, Mr. Cannot, I'm still not convinced.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Saving the world from danger is beyond Reunion's ability. It's not our job.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: I understand. But it can be a catalyst. We must start the engine before we discuss which way to go.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: You're better off looking to the idealists of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Rhodes Island alone is not enough, despite the talent they've gathered.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Have you heard of what they did in Kazimierz?
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Of course. I was there.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: They made a fine move, but one move will not be enough to bring victory in this great game. No one is more aware of that than themselves.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Even the resplendent fire burning in the Radiant Knight's heart is not enough to drive the dark clouds from the land.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Of course, it is still gratifying to see people like them, in this world of pain and hatred.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: 'Even as dark clouds gather, the spark of hope glows bright.'
attributes.name: Cannot
